Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM.synopsis: Ceremony of Gortash becoming the Grand Duke.The start of the dialog depends on whether Steel Watchers are enabled (present) or not.In the dialog Gortash tells you to kill Orin and then concludes the ceremony. Player can attack but it would be very hard to win.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_28.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_28.text: Kinspeople, Baldurians - friends. Thank you for joining me on this exceptional day.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_17.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - Lead In | LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_100.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_100.text: This is it. I can practically taste his blood from here.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_5.speaker: Wyll
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_5.text: My father's here, Karlach. Cool your fires - he must not come to harm.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_5.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_42.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_42.text: Careful, Karlach - we can't risk a confrontation here.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_127.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_127.text: A moment please, my friends - an old acquaintance has come to pay their respects.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_69.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_69.text: My respects?! You're lucky I've agreed not to shove my boot up your -
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_69.context: NodeContext: She's on the other side of the room, loud.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_24.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_24.text: My favourite assassin. I'm so glad you have returned to my side.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_121.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_121.text: Hang on... what?! You know each other?!

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_36.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_36.text: We have important matters to address. My reunion with Karlach can wait.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_6.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_6.text: Then fall back. I'm not letting him slip through my fingers again.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_16.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - LoopNodeContext: A bellow, a barbarian who has her target within reach

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_21.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_21.text: Do my eyes deceive me? Karlach, as I live and breathe. Come, my dear girl, and be welcome.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_59.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_115.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_115.text: And with her! My, my... it's my favourite Bhaalspawn. I never thought I would see you again, either.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash walks down the stairs

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_7.text: Enough talk. It's time you paid for what you did to Karlach.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_130.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_130.text: Couldn't have said it better myself.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_52.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_52.text: Tut tut. Orin was right, she did turn you to a half-wit. Watchers - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_57.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_57.text: Tut tut. Orin was right, she did turn you to a half-wit. Patriars - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_83.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_83.text: Tut tut. So much potential, gone to waste. Watchers - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gearing up for combat.NodeContext: "Tut" read aloud like a word (as opposed to a dental click).

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_32.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_32.text: Tut tut. So much potential, gone to waste. Patriars - to arms. The Absolute's assassins walk among us!
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gearing up for combat.NodeContext: "Tut" read aloud like a word (as opposed to a dental click).

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_47.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_47.text: If you attack Gortash now, you'll do it alone.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_81.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_81.text: I couldn't stand to see Gortash get his hands on you again. Let's wait for a more opportune moment.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_43.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_43.text: So we bide our time. But make no mistake, that monkey is mine.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_101.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_101.text: Wyll is right. We attack Gortash, and Ravengard falls too.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_79.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_79.text: Fine - I'll wait for now. But that prick Gortash is going to pay.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_104.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_104.text: Please come forward! What a surprise this is. My favourite assassin, back from their bloody disgrace, joined with my old bodyguard?

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_99.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_99.text: Wait... you know me as well as Karlach?

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_95.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_95.text: Oh, I'd forgotten - your memories are quite lost, aren't they? Orin told me she'd made a fool of you.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_106.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_106.text: To think you and Karlach travelled together all this time, and she hadn't the faintest you were one of my nearest and dearest.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_9.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_9.text: Let me clear up some mysteries, then. It's about time, I think.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_78.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_78.text: Don't talk to me. Talk to her.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_23.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_23.text: No offence to my old friend, but it's you I have been dying to see.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_11.text: After all, you abandoned us some time ago, leaving a rather uncomfortable hole in our plans.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_8.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_8.text: What business have you with me?

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_68.text: I'd hoped we'd get the chance to speak.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_129.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_129.text: There is so much for us to catch up on, dear Bhaalist.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_111.text: Let's get him while we have the chance. Lead the charge.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_82.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_82.text: He's not slipping through my fingers this time.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_55.text: The tiefling is letting her passions get the better of her. The situation is delicate. Do not be swept up in her emotions.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_55.context:
NodeContext: telepathic, Emperor not physically present (talking directly into your head) 
He's addressing the player

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_71.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_71.text: Kinspeople, Baldurians - and dearest Duke Ravengard. Thank you for joining me on this exceptional day.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_4.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - Lead In | LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_113.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_113.text: This is it. I can practically taste his blood from here.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_113.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_88.speaker: Wyll
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_88.text: My father's here, Karlach. Cool your fires - he must not come to harm.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_88.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_45.text: The tiefling is letting her passions get the better of her. The situation is delicate. Do not be swept up in her emotions.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_45.context:
NodeContext: telepathic, Emperor not physically present (talking directly into your head) 
He's addressing the player

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_84.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_84.text: Careful, Karlach - the Steel Watch will destroy us in one swipe if we attack Gortash here.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_87.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_87.text: So we bide our time. But make no mistake, that monkey is mine.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_125.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_125.text: Then stay light on your feet, soldier. They can't kill what they can't catch.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_124.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_124.text: We might need Gortash alive to save the city. Let's wait to strike until we've had the chance to question him.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_60.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_60.text: You're asking a lot. But I can wait - for a while, at least. Let's get Baldur's Gate safe, then rip his throat out.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_58.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_58.text: We can take whatever we need off his corpse.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_65.text: Stand down, villain. The Steel Watch commands it.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_72.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_72.text: Don't fucking touch me. GORTASH! FACE ME, YOU FUCKING ARSEHOLE!
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_72.context:
InternalNodeContext: Karlach may no longuer be in the dialogue. 
Depends on Steel Watcher presence. 
Karlach is no longer burning if present. 
+ Staging 01NodeContext: Full of fury.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_53.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_53.text: Ah. Apologies for the disruption, my friends. We appear to have guests.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera pans to Gortash while Karlach is apprehended off-screen and taken to jail.NodeContext: He recognizes Karlach but isn't letting on. He does a little movement with his right hand at the beginning to show he's asking ot take her away.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_48.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_48.text: Please do come forward - I believe we have business. If you'll excuse me a moment, ladies and gentlemen.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players approach Gortash and he steps down the stairs.NodeContext: Calling out to player.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_44.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_44.text: Where did that thing take Karlach?

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_64.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_64.text: To a holding cell, where she can cool down. I wouldn't dare harm such an old friend. But I can't have her disturbing our fete.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_91.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_91.text: As for you, I understand congratulations are in order. Thorm's defeat hasn't gone unnoticed. You're known - for who you are, and for that Netherstone that you carry.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_70.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_70.text: She chose her companions well, I see. You've brought Ketheric to his knees and made Orin grovel.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_13.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_13.text: Tsk. If she hadn't made a grand show of herself, my Steel Watch wouldn't have intervened.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_50.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_50.text: She can cool off in a holding cell. She's perfectly safe, I assure you.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_109.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_109.text: My reunion with her can wait. My reunion with you, however, cannot.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_126.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_126.text: What business have you with me?

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_15.text: Quite a bit, as it happens. I'd hoped to speak to you - most ardently, in fact.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_20.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_20.text: I'd hoped we'd get the chance to speak.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_25.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_25.text: As had I. Most ardently, in fact.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_98.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_98.text: Keep calm. If we do battle, my father will perish at our own hands.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_33.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_33.text: Wyll is right. We attack Gortash, and Ravengard falls too.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_35.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_35.text: Fine - I'll wait for now. But that prick Gortash is going to pay.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_103.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_103.text: A moment please, my friends - an old acquaintance has come to pay her respects. Please, Karlach, come say a proper hello.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_66.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_66.text: My respects?! You're lucky I've agreed not to shove my boot up your -
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_66.context: NodeContext: She's on the other side of the room, loud.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_105.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_105.text: Ah, how I've missed your colourful turns of phrase. We must catch up just as soon as I've had words with your little friend.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_49.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_49.text: We've a marvel on our hands, after all. You've brought Ketheric to his knees and made Orin grovel.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_96.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_96.text: I couldn't stand to see the Steel Watch get their hands on you. Let's wait for a more opportune moment.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_38.speaker: Karlach
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_38.text: I don't want to put you in harm's way either. I'll wait for now. But that prick is going to pay.
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_0.speaker: Player
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_0.text: Lead the charge, Karlach - Gortash dies today.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach takes off running down the aisle, but is blocked by a steel watcher who obscures her path.

Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_118.speaker: Wyll
Ceremony_OM_Karlach_COM_118.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.
